cmput301w16t08.scaling_pancake.models

Class InstrumentList

  • java.lang.Object
    • cmput301w16t08.scaling_pancake.models.InstrumentList

  • public class InstrumentList
extends java.lang.Object
    InstrumentList is meant to hold a list of Instrument objects. It is basically a wrapper around an ArrayList .
    See Also:
    Instrument

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      InstrumentList()
      Creates a new list of Instruments

        Throws:
